# AI How-To Guides

> Step-by-step guides for common AI development tasks in .NET. Topics include accessing data in AI functions, configuring chat clients, working with embeddings, and integrating with various AI providers. Use `AIFunction` and `AIFunctionFactory` for tool calling scenarios.

- [Access data in AI functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/how-to/access-data-in-functions.md): Learn how to pass data to AIFunction objects and how to access the data within the function delegate.
- [Authenticate an Azure hosted .NET app to Azure OpenAI using Microsoft Entra ID](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/how-to/app-service-aoai-auth.md): Learn how to authenticate your Azure hosted .NET app to an Azure OpenAI resource using Microsoft Entra ID.
- [Manage OpenAI Content Filtering in a .NET app](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/how-to/content-filtering.md): Learn how to manage OpenAI content filtering programmatically in a .NET app using the OpenAI client library.
